summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9685 lux) and cloud levels (up 332 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15088 lux), cloud levels (up 1911 m), feels like temperature (up 1.6°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 331.8m lower than yesterday, 840.7m lower than the past week, 1911.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 713m and a peak of 1594m, averaging 735.1m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, very clammy and humid and near calm conditions. Rain showers likely, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dark. Changeable conditions.
